title: Top 15+ Fast Food Memes for Lovers of Big Macs and Fries
description: Sometimes, there is nothing better than a late-night fast food order. Who wants a salad after a night out? Nine times out of ten, these fast food cravings could be resolved by just forgetting about it and going to bed, but where's the fun in that? The reality is there is a rush of adrenaline and excitement that comes when you decide to stop monitoring yourself for a moment and let yourself be free. By freedom, of course, we mean the freedom to order a quarterpounder, chicken tenders, or whatever your late-night food craving is. Failure to follow your heart when it comes to these desperate times can often result in feelings of regret or even greater, more intense late-night cravings on subsequent evenings. You might as well just give in and enjoy yourself. You can deal with the consequences afterward.Between now and your next McDonald's order at two in the morning, please enjoy these fast food-themed memes. For more content like this, check out this funny Trick or Treat story.
author: BenWeiss
excerpt: Top 15+ Fast Food Memes for Lovers of Big Macs and Fries - The internet has generated a huge amount of laughs from cats and FAILS. And we all out of cats.

html:
Sometimes, there is nothing better than a late-night fast food order. Who wants a salad after a night out? 

Nine times out of ten, these fast food cravings could be resolved by just forgetting about it and going to bed, but where's the fun in that? The reality is there is a rush of adrenaline and excitement that comes when you decide to stop monitoring yourself for a moment and let yourself be free. By freedom, of course, we mean the freedom to order a quarterpounder, chicken tenders, or whatever your late-night food craving is. Failure to follow your heart when it comes to these desperate times can often result in feelings of regret or even greater, more intense late-night cravings on subsequent evenings. You might as well just give in and enjoy yourself. You can deal with the consequences afterward.

Between now and your next McDonald's order at two in the morning, please enjoy these fast food-themed memes. For more content like this, check out this funny Trick or Treat story.
